abstract: The Saskatchewan government said Monday that if the federal government approves BHP Billiton’s foreign takeover of Potash they will consider it a “profound betrayal of our province and its people.”
snippet: The Saskatchewan government said Monday that if the federal government approves BHP Billiton’s foreign takeover of Potash they will consider it a “profound betrayal of our province and its people.”
lead_paragraph: The Saskatchewan government has said that if the Canadian government approves BHP Billiton‘s foreign takeover of the Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan they will consider it a “profound betrayal of our province and its people.”

headline.main: Saskatchewan Says Approving Potash Deal Would Be a ‘Betrayal’
